Tickets for the We The People Dinner, one of our most popular events, go on sale tomorrow afternoon at Noon. Bookmark the ticket link now!

20 years ago, Susan Hershberg created a fundraising dinner to benefit the work of ACLU-KY and the Fairness Campaign.

We the People 2020

Saturday, March 21
6:30 p.m. Reception | 8 p.m. Dinner
The Speed Art Museum
2035 S 3rd St
Louisville, KY 40208

Please note: This link will take you to a third-party website, fairness.org
Purchase Tickets


The event is more than just a benefit; it's an occasion to appreciate those who work on the front lines to create a more equitable Kentucky for all of us.

We hope that you will join us. Bookmark the ticket link now and set a reminder to purchase your tickets starting at noon tomorrow.
